page.title: 03THE COUNTRYSIDE (CONT.)
page.content: truth I hate it there.What I hate more is people saying how nice it is to live in the country, well it is not as they say.There are flies everywhere in the summer and in the winter we get blocked in by snow. It is alright, in fact it is exciting, for a while but when no-one's with me it starts to get boring. My name is Nathan Flood and I am eleven years old. I like the countryside because there are lots of woods nearby where I can make camps. In the summer there is an open heated, swimming pool, called the Lenham Swimming Club, which is open to club members. In the winter I go up into Chilston Park and sit on my sledge to slide down the hills. I wouldn't like to live in a town or city because of the danger in crossing the roads, the noise and no wide spaces to play.
